name: Myandroidapps
tagline: This is where i keep my apps
body:
For the entire source files just download the zip-file.
[Here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cem3o9qbfrbem7e/simple.apk?dl=0) you can download the simple.apk.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
